summary: LAST YEAR I BROUGHT MY EDGE IN FOR DOOR AJAR LIGHT TO A FORD DEALER. THEY FIXED IT AND IT COST 225.00. THIS WAS JULY 14 2016. IT HAS STARTED TO DO THE SAME THING LESS THEN A YEAR. THIS CAN BE A SAFETY ISSUE BECAUSE IF YOU JUST PRESS THE OK AND THE LIGHT GOES OUT THE DOORS WILL NOT LOCK. AND IF YOU HAVE CHILDREN IN THE BACK THEY CAN STILL OPEN THE DOOR..     FORD SHOULD BE RESPONSIBLE TO HAVE THIS FIX NOT THE CONSUMER.
